content: let s decorate the day 11 / 24 christmas tree with a bauble abbreviations chain - chain increase - increase difficulty mc - magic_ring decrease - decrease time 30 min slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet material yarnart jeans & jute hook 2 mm & 3 5 mm half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet tc - treble_crochet written pattern bauble jute round 9 decrease single_crochet 2 x6 total 18 round 0 mc round 10 decrease single_crochet x6 total 12 round 1 single_crochet 6 total 6 if you are planning to stuff the bauble do it before the round 2 increase 6 total 12 final decrease round 3 increase single_crochet x6 total 18 round 11 decrease 6 total 6 round 4 increase single_crochet 2 x6 total 24 cut the yarn and weave the ends in round 5-8 single_crochet 24 total 24 red dot yarnart jeans leaf yarnart jeans round 0 mc row 0 chain 8 turn round 1 single_crochet 6 total 6 row 1 single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet tc double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet sc3 in the top turn cut the yarn and weave the ends in row 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet tc double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet cut the yarn and weave the ends in sewing and decor sew the leaf and red dot to the top of the bauble if you wish to make more decorations you are free to do so hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the bauble congratulations you finished the 11th ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event 13 to go
